mapper.select: select b.Id,a.CumCode,a.BindStatus,b.SceneMode,b.VersionMode,b.ImgUrl, ImeiId,Model,MacAddr, b.AppVerName,b.SysVerName,b.CtrlVerName,b.RunMode,b.LastRunTime,b.LastRunStatus, c.ShopId, (select c1.name from Shop c1 where c1.id=c.ShopId) as ShopName, c.StoreId, (select c2.name from Store c2 where c2.id=c.StoreId) as StoreName from MerchDevice a left join Device b on a.DeviceId=b.Id left join ShopDevice c on a.DeviceId=c.DeviceId and c.BindStatus=1 where 1=1 and a.MerchId=#{where.MerchId} and a.DeviceId=#{where.DeviceId}

select b.Id,a.CumCode,a.BindStatus,b.SceneMode,b.VersionMode,b.ImgUrl, ImeiId,Model,MacAddr, b.AppVerName,b.SysVerName,b.CtrlVerName,b.RunMode,b.LastRunTime,b.LastRunStatus, c.ShopId, (select c1.name from Shop c1 where c1.id=c.ShopId) as ShopName, c.StoreId, (select c2.name from Store c2 where c2.id=c.StoreId) as StoreName from MerchDevice a left join Device b on a.DeviceId=b.Id left join ShopDevice c on a.DeviceId=c.DeviceId and c.BindStatus=1 where 1=1 and a.MerchId=#{where.MerchId} and b.SceneMode=#{where.SceneMode} and (a.DeviceId like concat('%', #{where.DeviceCode}, '%') or a.CumCode like concat('%', #{where.DeviceCode}, '%') )
